projects.title: InsightBench: Business Analytics Agents
projects.shortDescription: Published at ICLR 2025 - Multi-step insight generation system for business analytics.
projects.fullDescription: Multi-step insight generation system for business analytics agents through complex reasoning tasks.
details: Developed evaluation framework for business analytics agents through complex reasoning tasks
Implemented advanced prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques using PyTorch
Built scalable system for multi-step insight generation
Integrated modern LLM frameworks for production deployment

projects.title: RAG-Powered Healthcare Assistant
projects.shortDescription: Built retrieval-augmented generation system for medical queries using Llama-2 at UBC Innovation Support Unit.
projects.fullDescription: Built retrieval-augmented generation system for medical queries using Llama-2, reducing hallucinations in domain-specific healthcare queries.
details: Engineered sophisticated prompts for GPT-4 to improve response quality
Implemented Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for Llama-2
Reduced hallucinations in domain-specific healthcare queries
Improved response relevance for chronic fatigue activity recommendations
Integrated vector database optimization for medical knowledge retrieval

projects.title: Tiny-RFNet: Edge Signal Classification
projects.shortDescription: Published at CPSAT 2024 - Modulation classification of radio signals on edge systems.
projects.fullDescription: Modulation classification of radio signals on edge systems optimized for Jetson Orin Nano devices.
details: Developed lightweight neural network for radio frequency signal classification
Optimized for Jetson Orin Nano edge deployment
Implemented quantization and pruning techniques for edge hardware
Achieved significant performance improvements on resource-constrained devices
Published research findings at CPSAT 2024 conference

projects.title: Real-Time DSP for IoT Applications
projects.shortDescription: Advanced signal processing algorithms for mindful breathing applications at Prism Technology Holdings.
projects.fullDescription: Advanced signal processing algorithms for mindful breathing applications with real-time analysis and device connectivity.
details: Implemented advanced DSP algorithms for chest movement detection
Optimized code performance through multi-threading
Integrated Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) connectivity
Enabled real-time analysis and seamless data streaming
Reduced processing time for real-time applications

projects.title: Robotics Wildfire Simulation
projects.shortDescription: Robotic systems for wildfire response using Jetson Orin Nano with Zed Camera integration.
projects.fullDescription: Robotic systems simulation for wildfire response using Jetson Orin Nano with Zed Camera integration.
details: Developed robotic systems using Jetson Orin Nano with Zed Camera integration
Contributed to robotic arm design and programming
Implemented computer vision algorithms for wildfire detection
Presented work at CUCAI 2024 conference
Prepared for Canadian International Robotics Competition (CIRC 2024)
